Porsche 0-60 times

It feels like you love hitting the gas pedal to the very bottom and put some interest in Porsche vehicles. Curious to know what Porsche model has the best 0-60 times? For your convenience our team has collected the acceleration data in one place so that you could check out accurate stats on Porsche 0-60 times across models and years.

Browse through the variety of Porsche models to discover the brand’s vehicles with the best as well as the poorest 0-60 mph performance. You might also want to trace how 0-60 times of a specific Porsche model changed across years or compare between different models of the Porsche family.

Why is that so important? It is as simple as that. Although official Porsche 0-60 times are almost impossible to reach in real world conditions, at least, it is a great indicator of engine’s power. For only 1% of people are interested in this information, you may rightfully be proud of yourself!

The fastest Porsche cars

Porsche 918 Spyder 0-60 2.5 sec 1/4 mile 10 @ 143 mph
Porsche 911 0-60 2.5 - 5 sec 1/4 mile 10.6 @ 132 - 13.5 @ 102 mph
Porsche Panamera 0-60 3.2 - 6 sec 1/4 mile 11.8 @ 119 - 14.6 @ 95 mph
Porsche Carrera GT 0-60 3.5 sec 1/4 mile 11.3 @ 126 - 11.4 @ 126 mph
Porsche 718 Cayman 0-60 3.6 - 3.9 sec 1/4 mile 12 @ 117 - 12.4 @ 113 mph
Porsche 718 Boxster 0-60 3.9 - 4.8 sec 1/4 mile 12.4 @ 109 - 13.4 @ 103 mph
Porsche Macan 0-60 4.2 - 6.1 sec 1/4 mile 12.9 @ 107 - 14.6 @ 93 mph
Porsche Cayman 0-60 4.2 - 5.8 sec 1/4 mile 12.5 @ 115 - 14.3 @ 100 mph
Porsche Cayenne 0-60 4.2 - 9.1 sec 1/4 mile 12.9 @ 107 - 16.9 @ 79 mph
Porsche Boxster 0-60 4.3 - 6.1 sec 1/4 mile 12.6 @ 112 - 14.7 @ 97 mph
Porsche Cayman S 0-60 4.7 sec 1/4 mile 13 @ 103 - 13.1 @ 103 mph
Porsche Cayenne E-Hybrid 0-60 5.2 - 5.4 sec 1/4 mile 13.7 @ 103 - 13.8 @ 103 mph
Porsche Panamera E-Hybrid 0-60 5.2 sec 1/4 mile 13.6 @ 103 - 14.2 @ 99 mph
Porsche Panamera Hybrid 0-60 5.2 sec 1/4 mile 13.8 @ 100 mph
Porsche Cayenne Hybrid 0-60 5.4 sec 1/4 mile 13.8 @ 94 mph
